author: dpalmisano
msg: Includes annotation added. this allows to specify native nesting relationships between microformats extractors. This commit closes issue #80.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Added ExtractionParameters to the Extractor#run() signature. This will improve the specific extractor configuration. This commit is related to issue #160.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Improved error reporting in MicrodataExtractor. Related to issue #159.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Improved support for error location in MicrodataParser. Commit related to issue #159.

author: michele.mostarda
msg: Method reordering. Added method to extract node location. See issue #159.
